comment: I do not understand all the bad ratings for this professor. She is extremely nice and lenient and understanding to an extent. While the class is on the tougher side, if you do the work and ask questions when necessary, you will do fine. Literature is my weakest subject but I enjoyed being there because she actually taught us something useful

Professor Lawson's instructions for her assignments are a little difficult to understand. There's a lot of online discussions about the assigned essays to read. Required to write two essays during the semester. A fair grader. As long as you do the work correctly, and ask questions. You should be fine.
